TopicTitle: New to the game but not new to modeling

Articles.Content:
Hallo everyone.

I just got KSP few weeks ago and liked it. I'm hoping to get into modeling some parts at some point I been 3d modeling for 4 years in Trainz and build a number of things I use to using Gmax as my main program I don't think it will work for Kerbal not sure on that I haven't looked to it yet.

I also do lets plays and make videos for a few online games as well as blogs and such.

I'm always open to ideas and tips.

Bewell

Hello Reason, and welcome to the forum!

Nice username btw.

I look forward to seeing what you create.

Happy landings!

Thanks!

My username is form my toon on STO, Modelings fun I made alot of railroad stuff so this is a nice change for me.
